column2: sil- It implies a white or silver light
column3: often used when describing stars or the Moon.

column1: The word derives from the Sundocarme SIL/THIL "shine silver".
* Telperion#Names = "Shining Lights" (Silpion is another name for Telperion)
*"Elen síla lúme omentie" ("a star shines on the hour of our meeting")
